# .github/workflows/bmad-workflow.yml
name: BMAD Automated Workflow

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, develop]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  bmad-documentation:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '18'
      
      - name: Install BMAD
        run: npm install -g bmad-method
      
      - name: Generate Documentation
        env:
          BMAD_AUTO_COMMIT: false
          BMAD_LOG_LEVEL: info
        run: |
          bmad run document-project --auto
      
      - name: Commit Documentation
        if: github.event_name == 'push'
        run: |
          git config --local user.email "action@github.com"
          git config --local user.name "GitHub Action"
          git add docs/
          git diff --quiet && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "docs: auto-generated documentation"
          git push

  bmad-code-review:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '18'
      
      - name: Install BMAD
        run: npm install -g bmad-method
      
      - name: Run Code Review
        env:
          BMAD_LOG_LEVEL: debug
        run: |
          bmad run code-review --pr=${{ github.event.pull_request.number }}
      
      - name: Post Review Comments
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          script: |
            const fs = require('fs');
            const review = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('bmad-review.json', 'utf8'));
            github.rest.pulls.createReview({
              owner: context.repo.owner,
              repo: context.repo.repo,
              pull_number: context.issue.number,
              body: review.summary,
              event: review.approved ? 'APPROVE' : 'COMMENT'
            });

# .gitlab-ci.yml
stages:
  - test
  - build
  - deploy
  - documentation

variables:
  BMAD_LOG_LEVEL: "info"
  BMAD_AUTO_COMMIT: "false"

bmad-tests:
  stage: test
  image: node:18
  before_script:
    - npm install -g bmad-method
  script:
    - bmad run story-context --story=$CI_COMMIT_BRANCH
    - bmad run code-review --auto
  only:
    - merge_requests

bmad-documentation:
  stage: documentation
  image: node:18
  before_script:
    - npm install -g bmad-method
  script:
    - bmad run document-project --auto
    - bmad run generate-api-docs
  artifacts:
    paths:
      - docs/
    expire_in: 30 days
  only:
    - main

bmad-deployment:
  stage: deploy
  image: node:18
  before_script:
    - npm install -g bmad-method
  script:
    - bmad run code-deployment --env=$CI_ENVIRONMENT_NAME
  environment:
    name: production
  when: manual
  only:
    - main

# azure-pipelines.yml
trigger:
  - main
  - develop

pool:
  vmImage: 'ubuntu-latest'

variables:
  BMAD_LOG_LEVEL: 'info'
  NODE_VERSION: '18.x'

stages:
- stage: Documentation
  jobs:
  - job: GenerateDocs
    steps:
    - task: NodeTool@0
      inputs:
        versionSpec: $(NODE_VERSION)
      displayName: 'Install Node.js'
    
    - script: |
        npm install -g bmad-method
      displayName: 'Install BMAD'
    
    - script: |
        bmad run document-project --auto
      displayName: 'Generate Documentation'
      env:
        BMAD_AUTO_COMMIT: false
    
    - task: PublishBuildArtifacts@1
      inputs:
        PathtoPublish: 'docs'
        ArtifactName: 'documentation'
      displayName: 'Publish Documentation'

- stage: CodeReview
  condition: eq(variables['Build.Reason'], 'PullRequest')
  jobs:
  - job: ReviewCode
    steps:
    - task: NodeTool@0
      inputs:
        versionSpec: $(NODE_VERSION)
    
    - script: |
        npm install -g bmad-method
      displayName: 'Install BMAD'
    
    - script: |
        bmad run code-review --pr=$(System.PullRequest.PullRequestId)
      displayName: 'Run Code Review'
      env:
        BMAD_LOG_LEVEL: debug
